Package elements

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    LightSource
    An interface that unifies all light sources, because for all of them we need a function that calculates the intensity of light according to a point and in addition we need a function to calculate the direction vector for the point.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AmbientLight
    Class for the lighting setting that illuminates the scene
    Camera
    class to represent the camera.
    Camera.CameraBuilder
    Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Camera), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it
    CameraRayIntersectionsIntegrationTests
    Class that tests the integration of rays coming out of a camera and their intersection with the view-plane and the geometric shapes
    CameraTests
    Testing Camera Class
    DirectionalLight
    A class that represents light that comes from very far away (like the sun), we have no meaning to distance in this case because it is always infinite, there is meaning only to the direction of light
    Light
    A class that represents all the lighting sources that all have intensity
    LightsTests
    Test rendering a basic image
    PointLight
    A class representing a point light source that illuminates around it in a spherical shape
    ReflectionRefractionTests
    Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
    ShadowTests  
    SpotLight
    A class representing a spot light source that illuminates around it in a half-spherical shape
